Sentencas: A hybrid system is proposed based on a driving unit integrated with an air-cooled compression and an air-cooled absorption chiller.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system

Sentencas: The cooling capacity of the hybrid system is used for air conditioning of a residential building.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system

Sentencas: The prime mover can either be a micro-gas turbine, a gas turbine, or a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system

Sentencas: In order to investigate the effect of the operating conditions and the type of driving unit, energy and exergy analyses have been carried out.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system

Sentencas: The efficiency factors and the exergy destruction in each component have also been studied.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system

Sentencas: The results show that the maximum irreversibilities happen in the generator or in the air-cooled condenser, and the total destruction is higher for the gas turbine case compared to the other two cases.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system

Sentencas: It appears that the increase in the ambient temperature causes a decrease in the energy utilization factor but an increase in the second law efficiency.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system

Sentencas: This process is reversed with an increase in evaporating temperature, whereby an increase in the energy utilization factor and a decrease in the second law efficiency is experienced.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of absorption-compression hybrid air-conditioning system
